/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light on the scene below. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
